body: Do China's massive state-backed efforts at ensuring energy security constitute a violation of WTO trade rules? United Steelworkers seems to think so, and Angry Chinese Blogger looks today at the nature of the American union's complaints.
original_body: Do China's massive state-backed efforts at ensuring energy security constitute a violation of WTO trade rules? United Steelworkers seems to think so, and Angry Chinese Blogger looks today at the nature of the American union's complaints.
title: China: Wind power drive target of complaints

sentence: Do China's massive state-backed efforts at ensuring energy security constitute a violation of WTO trade rules?
United Steelworkers seems to think so, and Angry Chinese Blogger looks today at the nature of the American union's complaints.
